container.description: Name of the container in lxd.

create_dirs.description: Create any directories necessary in the container.

gid.description: Set the file's gid on push, overwrite the `source` option.

lxd_target.description: Path to the destination of the file inside the container as "<container>/<path>". Concatenation of the `container` property with the `target` property.

mode.description:
Set the file's perms on push. LXD only support the absolute
representation. When passing a string, an integer is casted to its
octal value and passing a symbolic value will throw an error.

source.description: Path to the file to push to the container on your local machine.

target.description: Path to the destination of the file once it has been pushed to the container.

uid.description: Set the file's uid on push.
